actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to certain international treaties and agreements.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize the United States to pay for any increased operating costs of a municipality's treatment works resulting from a treaty or other agreement between the United States and any foreign country which imposes upon a municipality more stringent pollution standards than those imposed by the Federal Water Pollution Control Act. Authorizes the appropriation of funds necessary for carrying out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to certain international treaties and agreements.
